generated_body: The article titled "'Baby Shark' Devoured Your Brain. Your Wallet Is Harder to Swallow" is likely to explore the cultural impact of the viral children's song "Baby Shark," examining how its popularity has influenced consumer behavior and spending patterns. Readers can expect insights into the broader effects of entertainment trends on economic choices, although the specifics of these connections may vary.
